      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean login()
      Checks if the provided details correspond to an existing user.
      static void setBackground(boolean sidebar)
      Creates the two rectangles for the background and gives them the appropriate size.
      void setLayout()
      Creates the background of the login page.
      void setupButtons()
      Sets up the buttons on the side menu and the save button, which calls the function to login the user.
      void setupGrid()
      Sets up the spacing between the elements in rows and in columns.
      void setupPasswordFields()
      Sets up the password field for the user to fill in and used an event handler to login when enter is pressed.
      void setupTextFields()
      Sets up the username field for the user to fill in.
      void setupTitle()
      Creates and places the title of the page.

        public static void setWhiteBox(int boxWidth,
               int boxHeight,
               boolean sidebar)
        Creates a white box of a specified size with a border and rounded edges.
        Parameters:
        boxWidth - desired width of the white box containing the data
        boxHeight - desired height of the white box containing the data

        Creates the two rectangles for the background and gives them the appropriate size.

      • setupPasswordFields

        public void setupPasswordFields()
        Sets up the password field for the user to fill in and used an event handler to login when enter is pressed.

      • setupButtons

        public void setupButtons()
        Sets up the buttons on the side menu and the save button, which calls the function to login the user.

      • setupTitle

        public void setupTitle()
        Creates and places the title of the page.

      • login

        public boolean login()
        Checks if the provided details correspond to an existing user. If they do the user is logged in, otherwise it displays a warning message.
